mapper.insert: insert into ec_risk_ent (cust_no, credit_rating, wht_equity_clear, wht_equity_pledge, wht_ent_loan, loan_amt, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whtEquityClear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whtEquityPledge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whtEntLoan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_risk_ent set credit_rating = #{creditRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wht_equity_clear = #{whtEquityClear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wht_equity_pledge = #{whtEquityPledge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wht_ent_loan = #{whtEntLoan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_amt = #{loanAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_no, credit_rating, wht_equity_clear, wht_equity_pledge, wht_ent_loan, loan_amt, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_risk_ent where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
